:: Work

République Démocratique du Cinéma

My current project. A sentiment analysis app. The idea is to aggregate tweets about a movie, analyse them and finally display the results for all to see. In "real-time (tm)".

You can learn more about that project by reading the articles on my blog (the ones beging with 'RDC-')

>> See the code on Github

MovieList

An app to manage a list of movie to watch. Really easy to use.

The concept is simple, but I tried to make a really good UI/UX.

And it's responsive, Y'all!

>> See it live !
>> See the code on Github
